name: Parallel Config Processor
description: Starts parallel processor pipelines through generic configs, which are merged upon completion.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of these parallelly executed flows to identify in Monitor.

parameters.name: merger
parameters.description:
The merger class to be used to merge the results of the processors. For example:

tuktu.processors.merge.SimpleMerger
tuktu.processors.merge.JSMerger
tuktu.processors.merge.PaddingMerger
tuktu.processors.merge.SerialMerger

parameters.name: include_original
parameters.description: Merge the other results into the original DataPacket, or not.

parameters.name: send_original
parameters.description: Whether or not to send the original source packet. If set to false, a dummy empty DataPacket is sent. Use with caution.

parameters.name: send_whole
parameters.description: Send the whole DataPacket, or sends each datum inside the DataPacket separately. In the latter case, each datum will be processed and merged separately, and after that concatenated to form the new resulting DataPacket.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: The duration in seconds to wait for the results of each individual DataPacket before timing out. If nothing is specified, the global timeout duration of the Tuktu node this flow is running on be used.

parameters.name: pipelines
parameters.description: Each entry is defining a pipeline of processors for which an Enumeratee is built. The results of each is then merged using the merger class.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The IDs of the processors to compose first. Due to current limitations, the result of the first processor in the processor flow after each start with not exactly one successor is used for merging, ie. no branching is supported.

parameters.name: processor_id
parameters.description: The ID of the processor to compose first. Due to current limitations, the result of the first processor in the processor flow after this start with not exactly one successor is used for merging, ie. no branching is supported.

parameters.name: config_path
parameters.description: The path of the config file.

parameters.name: replacements
parameters.description: Local replacements used to replace Tuktu config strings #{source} by target, in this instance of this config only; will overwrite global replacements of the same name.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The #{key} that will be replaced by the target string below in the invoked configs: #{source} -> target. Can contain Tuktu strings to populate with first Datum.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The replacement for the source above: #{source} -> target. Can contain Tuktu strings to populate with first Datum.

parameters.name: replacements
parameters.description: The replacements used to replace Tuktu config strings #{source} by target.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The #{key} that will be replaced by the target string below in the invoked configs: #{source} -> target. Can contain Tuktu strings to populate with first Datum.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The replacement for the source above: #{source} -> target. Can contain Tuktu strings to populate with first Datum.
